problem.markdown: Your impression of the contents of the course: ( ) Much of the content was new to me, and hence I learnt a lot. ( ) I was familiar with some content, but I learnt many topics that I had not learnt earlier. ( ) I was familiar with much of the content, only a few topics were new for me. ( ) I was familiar with most of the topics covered here, there was hardly anything new for me to learn.
problem.p: Your impression of the contents of the course:

choicegroup.choice: Much of the content was new to me, and hence I learnt a lot.
I was familiar with some content, but I learnt many topics that I had not learnt earlier.
I was familiar with much of the content, only a few topics were new for me.
I was familiar with most of the topics covered here, there was hardly anything new for me to learn.
